quote: I leave, and the leaving is so exhilarating I know I can never go back. But then what? Do I just keep leaving places, and leaving them, and leaving them, tramping a perpetual journey?
quote_letters: I LEAVE AND THE LEAVING IS SO EXHILARATING I KNOW I CAN NEVER GO BACK BUT THEN WHAT DO I JUST KEEP LEAVING PLACES AND LEAVING THEM AND LEAVING THEM TRAMPING A PERPETUAL JOURNEY
